meanings.definition: A style of design characterized by geometric shapes and bold colors.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with deco furniture, featuring bright colors and unique shapes.
meanings.sent2: I love the art deco style with its bold patterns and vibrant hues.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations had a fun deco theme, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a masterpiece of deco design, standing out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The deco artwork on the walls brought life to the otherwise dull room.

meanings.definition: To decorate or adorn in a stylish or artistic manner.
meanings.sent1: She decided to deco her room with fairy lights and colorful posters.
meanings.sent2: The cake was beautifully decoed with intricate frosting designs.
meanings.sent3: He tried to deco his car with stickers, but it ended up looking messy.
meanings.sent4: The garden was decoed with twinkling lights for the evening party.
meanings.sent5: They planned to deco the stage with flowers and ribbons for the performance.

meanings.definition: Short for 'decoy', a device used to attract or lure animals or people.
meanings.sent1: The hunters set up a deco to attract the ducks to their location.
meanings.sent2: The spy used a deco to distract the guards while sneaking into the building.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox created a deco to trick the other animals and steal their food.
meanings.sent4: The treasure hunters placed a shiny deco to lead explorers off the true path.
meanings.sent5: The fishermen used a deco to lure the fish closer to their boat for an easy catch.
